description: Non material amendment to planning permission ref: 78059/APP/2023/2542 dated 23.11.23 (Erection of a single storey extension to the side and rear of the dwelling. Conversion of garage to habitable accommodation with amendments to fenestration. Conversion of roof space to habitable use to include 4 side facing roof lights, extension to the rear and conversion from hip to gable end with new gable end window to the rear)  for the addition of 1x Roof light to side elevation pitched roof, 3x Roof lights to single storey side extensions flat roof. One Chimney to the far back removed and other two main chimneys are to be retained.
decision_conditions: The proposed works constitute development under Sec 55 of the Act and require an application for full planning permission. The proposed plans indicate amendments which would result in the installation of windows and removal of a chimney. The proposed works would introduce new development that was not included in the planning permission and conflict with Condition 5 of the original permission therefore does not constitute a non-material amendment under section 96A TCPA 1990. The potential impacts therefore need to be considered against development plan policies.
